getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.description: Install ReEnd-Components into your React project in minutes. Available on npm as a public package.

step1.title: Step 1 — Install Package
step1.description: Install reend-components and its peer dependencies using your preferred package manager.
step1.peer_deps_note: These must be installed in your project (most React projects already have them):

step2.title: Step 2 — Configure Tailwind CSS
step2.description: ReEnd ships a Tailwind preset with the Endfield design system tokens. Add it to your config for seamless integration.
step2.preset_color_palette: Endfield color palette (ef-yellow, ef-blue, ef-red, ef-green, etc.)
step2.preset_semantic_tokens: Semantic tokens (background, foreground, primary, muted, etc.)
step2.preset_custom_fonts: Custom fonts (Saira, Chakra Petch, JetBrains Mono)
step2.preset_dark_mode: Dark mode support via class strategy

step3.title: Step 3 — Import Styles
step3.description: Import the CSS design tokens to get the Endfield visual language. Choose between CSS variables or the pre-built stylesheet.
step3.option_a_desc: Import the variables file in your global CSS. Works with any styling solution.
step3.option_b_desc: If you're not using Tailwind, import the pre-built CSS that includes all design tokens and base styles.
step3.note_desc: All color values use HSL without the wrapper, enabling alpha channel support:

step4.title: Step 4 — Use Components
step4.description: Import and use ReEnd components in your React application. All components are tree-shakeable and fully typed.

api_reference.title: API Reference
api_reference.description: Complete list of all exported components, utilities, and hooks available in reend-components.

exports.TooltipTrigger: Element that triggers the tooltip on hover/focus
exports.TooltipProvider: Context provider for tooltip delay/skip settings
exports.Toast: Radix Toast notification with variant support
exports.ToastTitle: Title text within a toast notification
exports.ToastProvider: Context provider for Radix toast system
exports.SonnerToaster: Sonner-based toast container with Endfield styling
exports.useToast: Returns { toasts, toast, dismiss } for Radix toasts

theming.title: Theming & Customization
theming.description: Override design tokens to match your brand while keeping the Endfield visual language.
theming.dark_light_desc: Toggle .light class on your document root to switch modes. All tokens auto-update.

full_example.title: Full Project Example
full_example.description: A complete setup from scratch — new Vite + React project with ReEnd-Components integrated.
full_example.done_desc: Your app is now running with the Endfield design system. All components, design tokens, and animations are available. Visit the component sections in the sidebar to explore more components and usage patterns.
